LightningComponentBundle.description: A collapsible sidebar app launcher that presents a small tab to the user, then expands to reveal available apps when clicked.

property.label: Tab Text
property.name: tabText
property.description: Text displayed in the tab used to open or close the app launcher.

property.label: Menu Header
property.name: menuHeader
property.description: Text displayed above the items in the app launcher.

property.label: Ignore App Launcher Profile Perm
property.name: ignoreAppLauncherProfilePerm
property.description: When checked, the app launcher sidebar will display for all users instead of checking the 'Enable the App Launcher in Experience Builder Sites' permission.

property.label: Display Internal Apps
property.name: showInternalApps
property.description: When checked, the app launcher sidebar will display apps in Lightning Experience when permission for them is granted.
